application.name: chan1m32isis
application.brief: Import Chandrayaan-1 Moon Mineralogy Mapper (M3) images into ISIS cubes
application.description:
This program imports Chandrayaan-1 Moon Mineralogy Mapper (M3) Level 1B (L1B) or Level 0 (L0) PDS products into ISIS cubes.
Chandrayaan-1 M3 L1B PDS data products consist of:
An detached PDS label file
A multiple-band image file containing the calibrated spectral radiance image data in units of (W/m^2/µm/sr)
A 3-band image file containing pixel location data
A 10 band image file containing observation geometry
Chandrayaan-1 M3 L0 PDS data products consist of:
An detached PDS label file
A multi-band file containing the raw data

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input detached PDS formatted Chandrayaan-1 M3 label file
parameter.description:
This file is a detached PDS formatted label which contains pointers to the following files:
Multi-band image of calibrated spectral radiance level 1B data or raw level 0 data (*_RDN.IMG, *_L0.IMG)
Three band image containing position of each image pixel on the Moon (*_LOC.IMG). Not used for L0 label files.
Ten band image containing observation geometry (*_OBS.IMG). Not used for L0 label files.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.brief: Output calibrated spectral radiance image cube
parameter.description: Output ISIS cube containing calibrated spectral radiance pixels (units of W/m^2/µm/sr) or level 0 raw data.

parameter.name: LOC
parameter.brief: Optional output file containing lunar surface location of all radiance image pixels.
parameter.description:
This is an optional output file containing location information for the center of all pixels contained in the radiance image file (L1B) created from the "TO" parameter. The output ISIS cube will 3 band containing the following:
Planetocentric latitude in decimal degrees
Longitude in decimal degrees
Radius in meters from the Moon center
If the "TO" parameter is not an L1B product then this keyword will be ignored.

parameter.name: OBS
parameter.brief: Optional output file containing observation geometry information for all radiance image pixels.
parameter.description:
This is an optional output file containing observation geometry information for each pixel in the radiance image. The output ISIS cube with have ten bands containing the following:
To-sun azimuth angle (decimal degrees, clockwise from local north)
To-sun zenith angle (incidence angle in decimal degrees, zero at zenith)
To-sensor azimuth angle (decimal degrees, clockwise from local north)
To-sensor zenith angle (emission angle in decimal degrees, zero at zenith)
Observation phase angle (decimal degrees, in plane of to-sun and to-sensor rays)
To-sun path length (decimal au with scene mean subtracted and noted in PDS label)
To-sensor path length (decimal meters)
Surface slope from DEM (decimal degrees, zero at horizontal)
Surface aspect from DEM (decimal degrees, clockwise from local north)
Local cosine i (unitless, cosine of angle between to-sun and local DEM facet normal vectors)
If the "TO" parameter is not an L1B product then this keyword will be ignored.
